# Plumbline MK - Plumbing & Heating Engineers, Milton Keynes

> Plumbline MK is a Gas Safe registered plumbing and heating company based in Milton Keynes, Buckinghamshire. We provide boiler installation, repair, servicing, emergency plumbing, underfloor heating, and gas safety certificates across Milton Keynes and surrounding areas within a 50-mile radius.

## Business Information

- Name: Plumbline MK
- Type: Plumbing & Heating Engineers
- Location: 3 Ayrton Close, Grange Farm, Milton Keynes, MK8 0PA
- Phone: 07805 844 016
- Landline: 01908 229 560
- Email: enquiries@plumblinemk.co.uk
- Website: https://www.plumblinemk.co.uk
- Gas Safe Registration: 957816
- Founded by: Robert (10+ years experience)
- Team: Robert (Founder), Sam Tilney (Gas Engineer)

## Accreditations

- Gas Safe Registered (#957816)
- Worcester Bosch Accredited Installer (up to 12-year warranty)
- Vaillant Accredited Installer (up to 10-year warranty)
- Baxi Approved Installer
- Ideal Approved Installer

## Service Areas

Milton Keynes, Newport Pagnell, Buckingham, Bedford, Northampton, Luton, Leighton Buzzard, Aylesbury, Bedfordshire, Hertfordshire (50-mile radius from MK8 0PA)

## Services & Pricing

### Boiler Installation
- Standard combi swap (like-for-like): From £1,800
- Full combi installation (new position): From £2,200
- System or heat-only boiler: From £2,500
- All installations include: free Hive smart thermostat, system flush, building regs certification, 12-month labour guarantee
- Up to 12-year manufacturer warranty on Worcester Bosch boilers
- URL: https://www.plumblinemk.co.uk/services/boiler-installation

### Boiler Repair
- Call-out rate: From £65
- Typical repair cost: £80-£300
- Same-day emergency repairs available
- 12-month guarantee on all repairs
- All makes and models
- URL: https://www.plumblinemk.co.uk/services/boiler-repair

### Boiler Servicing
- Annual boiler service: £60-£100
- 45-60 minutes duration
- Full inspection, cleaning, safety checks, service report
- Recommended annually, ideally before winter
- URL: https://www.plumblinemk.co.uk/services/boiler-servicing

### Gas Safety Certificates (CP12)
- Landlord gas safety certificates
- Legal requirement for rental properties (annual)
- Digital certificates available
- Competitive rates for portfolios
- URL: https://www.plumblinemk.co.uk/services/gas-safety-certificate

### Emergency Plumbing
- 24/7 emergency callout
- Boiler breakdowns, burst pipes, no heating/hot water
- Fast response across Milton Keynes
- URL: https://www.plumblinemk.co.uk/services/emergency-plumbing

### Underfloor Heating
- Wet (hydronic) systems: £50-£100 per m²
- Electric systems: £20-£50 per m²
- New builds and retrofits
- Free site survey
- URL: https://www.plumblinemk.co.uk/services/underfloor-heating

### Boiler Cover Plans
- Monthly cover plans for peace of mind
- Annual service included
- No call-out charges for covered repairs
- URL: https://www.plumblinemk.co.uk/services/boiler-cover

### Powerflushing
- Removes sludge, rust, and limescale from central heating systems
- Improves heating efficiency and reduces energy bills
- URL: https://www.plumblinemk.co.uk/services/powerflushing

## Key Selling Points

- 100+ 5-star reviews on Google and Facebook
- 5.0 Google rating
- 10+ years experience
- Transparent, fixed-price quotes with no hidden fees
- Free Hive smart thermostat with every boiler installation
- 12-month guarantee on all repairs
- Up to 12-year manufacturer warranty on new boilers
- 24/7 emergency service
- 50-mile coverage radius from Milton Keynes

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Are your engineers Gas Safe registered?
A: Yes, all Plumbline MK engineers are fully qualified and Gas Safe registered (registration #957816). We carry our Gas Safe ID cards on every job.

Q: How much does a boiler installation cost?
A: A new boiler installation in Milton Keynes typically costs between £1,800 and £3,500. A standard combi boiler swap starts from £1,800. All quotes are fixed-price with no hidden fees. Free Hive smart thermostat included.

Q: What areas do you cover?
A: We cover Milton Keynes and surrounding areas within a 50-mile radius, including Newport Pagnell, Buckingham, Bedford, Northampton, Luton, and Leighton Buzzard.

Q: Do you offer free quotes?
A: Yes, all quotes are completely free with no obligation. Call 07805 844 016, WhatsApp us, or fill in our online form.

Q: What warranty do you offer on new boilers?
A: Up to 12 years manufacturer warranty on Worcester Bosch boilers and up to 10 years on Vaillant boilers. Plus 12-month workmanship guarantee on all pipework and labour.

Q: How often should I get my boiler serviced?
A: Once a year, ideally before winter. Annual servicing maintains efficiency, keeps your warranty valid, and is a legal requirement for landlords.

Q: Do you offer emergency plumbing?
A: Yes, we offer 24/7 emergency callouts for boiler breakdowns, burst pipes, no heating or hot water, and other urgent plumbing issues across Milton Keynes.

Q: How much does a plumber cost in Milton Keynes?
A: Our call-out rate starts from £65 for standard jobs. Boiler repairs typically range from £80-£300. We always provide a fixed quote before starting work.
